name: Prowl.alfredworkflow
tagline: Alfred workflow to send Prowl alerts to your mobile phone
body:
### Welcome to Prowl Alfred Workflow

This [Alfred 2 workflow](http://www.alfredapp.com/) allow you to send [Prowl](http://www.prowlapp.com/) alerts to your mobile phone. 

It requires [Alfred 2 and the Powerpack](http://www.alfredapp.com/powerpack/) plus [Prowl](http://www.prowlapp.com/).

### Installation

To install, simply [download the workflow](https://github.com/slashk/prowl.alfredworkflow/blob/master/prowl.alfredworkflow?raw=true) (the `prowl.alfredworkflow` file) and then double-click it in the finder. It will open Alfred and ask you to allow it to be installed.

### Configuration

To configure this workflow for the first time (or anytime you change you API key), type "prowl" followed by your API key (found under the [API Keys tab](https://www.prowlapp.com/api_settings.php) and then pressing enter **WHILE HOLDING THE COMMAND KEY**. When pressing the command key, you should see the action description change to "Set Prowl API Key."

When setting a new key, the workflow will verify it first. Should there be a problem with verifying the key, a notification saying "_No APIKEY. Please configure by holding down the cmd key and pasting in prowl APIKEY._" will be shown.

### Usage

To use, simply type the keyword "prowl" and your message to be sent to your mobile (separated by a space). Your alert will be sent to your mobile phone at prowl priority "Normal."

A notification will be shown on the screen showing if the alert was sent successfully or not.

### Support

Open an issue ticket at https://github.com/slashk/prowl.alfredworkflow/issues
